name: componentry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the different parts that make up something such as a machine, an engine, an electronic device, etc.: The laptop has very impressive componentry for the price. The car has a rear-seat armrest that hides electronic componentry.
More examplesFewer examplesThe electronic componentry is contained in a robust plastic box.Poor-quality componentry lets the device down.Most mid-priced commuter bikes, the majority of mountain bikes and many road bikes have the same brand of componentry.There are many different forms of software componentry for different purposes.All the componentry is hidden in the back of the slim, stylish TV.
